column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I would go to try deep dish pizza each time I visit Chicago. But this time
column3: I decided to try this one based on the recommendation of Yelp. After waiting for a long 40 minutes
column4: my pizza is finally served. This is acceptable since I have been notified about this and I know that is how long baking a deep dish pizza should take. However
column6: I expect a hot and stringy pizza on the table
column7: which is not the case at all when I visited this restaurant. I can't see why I spent this long time to get this COLD pizza. Anyway
column8: since the bad experience in this restaurant
column9: I will never visit it again.
